name: A pair of shimmering semite leggings
data: It increases the users wisdom a good amount.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has great armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'air lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'water lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'earth lore'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'fire lore'.
Semite leggings help you attune more to the world around you.
